resources.string: This app would like to make use of a Spotify API to fetch data in the JSON format and Search for Music and Artist. It should fetch data from the user Spotify account. There is a page with the now playing song and an activity where to save our favourite songs.
Search will look for Artist or Song names over the Spotify API and will return Data in JSON format listing the results in the card views belos the Search entry
this screen will show the album cover and the Track and artist info plus controls to skip play stop the song.
This activity should contain favourites albums and songs chosen from the user when clicking the heart icon form the Now Playing Activity
My Library will fetch data from Spotify API and return JSON format data to fill the Library divided in Albums and Artists
